text: Mitchell "Mitch" Ryan (January 11, 1934 - March 4, 2022) was an American actor. He was known for his roles as Burke Devlin in Dark Shadows, Edward Montgomery in Dharma & Greg and as Dr. Terence Wynn in Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers. He also played the villain General Peter McAllister in Lethal Weapon. Ryan was born on January 11, 1934 in Cincinnati, Ohio. He was raised in Louisville, Kentucky.Entry about Mitchell Ryan in the Internet Movie Database, accessed October 9, 2012 He was married to Lynda Morse from 1972 until they divorced. They had three children. Ryan died on March 4, 2022 at his home in Los Angeles, California from congestive heart failure, aged 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television personalities Category:Actors from Cincinnati Category:Actors from Louisville, Kentucky Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure
title: Mitchell Ryan
